rukus.text: 7|109|Firuaun no min no chōrō-tachi wa itta. `Kore wa rōren'na majutsu-shida.
7|110|Kare wa, kono kokudo kara anata gata o oidasou to nozonde iru. Sate anata gata no shuchō wa dō ka.'
7|111|Kare-ra wa (firuaun) ni itta. `Kare to sono kyōdai o shibaraku doka se, shōshūsha o sho toshi ni noko wa shite,
7|112|rōren'na majutsu-shi o anata no tokoro ni zen'in yobidashite wa.'
7|113|Sokode majutsu-shi-tachi wa firuaun no moto ni kite itta. `Watashi-tachi ga kattanaraba, kitto watashi-tachi ni hōshō ga arudeshou.'
7|114|Kare wa itta. `Sōda. (Sono Jō) watashi wa anata gata o, kanarazu watashi no sokkin ni surudearou.'
7|115|Kare-ra wa itta. `Mūsā yo, anata ga nageru no ka, soretomo watashi-tachi ga (sakini) nageru no ka.'
7|116|Kare (mūsā) wa itta. `Anata gataga (sakini) nage nasai. Sokode kare-ra wa nagete hitobito no me o madowashi, kare-ra o osore sase, dai majutsu o enshutsu shita.
7|117|Sonotoki ware wa mūsā ni,`anata no tsue o nage nasai.' To keiji shita. Suruto miyo. Sore wa kare-ra no 瞞 Mono o (mina) nomikonde shimatta.
7|118|Kōshite shinri ga araware, kare-ra no okonatta koto wa munashiku nari,
7|119|kare-ra wa uchi makasa re, chidjimiagatte shimatta.
7|120|Majutsu-shi-tachi wa mi o nagedashite sajida shi,
7|121|itta. `Watashi-tachi wa, ban'yū no omo o shinkō shimasu,

7|123|Firuaun wa itta. `Anata gata wa, watashi ga yurusanai uchi ni kare o shinkō suru no ka. Tashika ni kore wa anata gata no machi de takuranda inbō de, koko no min o oidasou to suru noda. Daga anata gata wa yagate shirudearou.
7|124|Watashi wa anata gata no te to ashi o, kanarazu tagaichigai ni setsudan shi, sorekara mina o jūjika ni kakerudearou.'
7|125|Kare-ra wa itta. `Hontōni watashi-tachi wa,-nushi no moto ni kisa reru nodesu.

7|126|Daga anata gata wa,-nushi no shirushi ga watashi-tachi no moto ni kite, watashi-tachi ga tan'ni sore o shinkō suru to iu dake de, watashi-tachi ni hōfuku sa reru nodesu ka. Omo yo, watashi-tachi ni nintai o atae, musurimu to shite shina sete kudasai.'
